pages.text: Wither of the Diffusion can ripen crops. If the target of the spell is a creature, it can increase the age of the creature.$(br2)$(t:Raising these attributes for functional spells increases the benefit)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Benefit attributes：$(/t)$(t:Raising the Force can increase gains)$(li2)$(#00CED1)Force$(/t)$()
